page.title: 11TOTTON REHABILITATION CENTRE
page.content: The centre is situated next to Hounsdown Secondary School and the Hampshire Road Depot.The building was built in 1969.The head of the centre is Mr. Ray White,who has been in charge for 6 years. The catchment area is Waterside, Dibden, Fawley, Hythe, Blackfield, Lyndhurst, Romsey, Emery Down and Totton. The school day is from 9.00am to 4.00pm and it costs Â£50 to keep someone at the centre for a week.The age group is 16+. The aim of the centre is to make mentally handicapped people independent. The activities include work experience, industries, cookery, sports, communications and cycling. The centre gives relief to families of mentally handicapped people.
